name: Knights of Pen and Paper 2: Free Edition
description:
Join the retro RPG world of Paperos - become a Knight of Pen and Paper in the newly revamped "Free Edition"!

You heard right! Enter and experience the horror of another beloved game franchise joining the dark side of free to play. Not tough enough? Turn on easy mode and pay your way to victory!

Play as both Party and Game Master playing a tabletop RPG (yeah, very meta) and face hours and hours of humoristic and nail-biting challenges!
